name: The Shepherd and the Arsonist
description:
(Warnings for vaguely alluded violence and suicidal themes.)

Made in a week for the O2A2 jam, where only one of any asset is allowed and the word limit is 1k. I'd never used Renpy before this project, so a variety of things are rough around the edges, but nevertheless, I'm proud of what I've accomplished in a short time limit and am happy to have had the push to finally attempt a VN of my own!

I do have stories in mind for these characters beyond the scope of the game, but I didn' t have a lot of room to detail, so I tried to work with vague suggestions. Hopefully that empty space is evocative.
